attributes.action: Hold a referendum on a temporary increase on income tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the Prime Minister and the Chancellor to look into increasing the rate of income tax up to £1 pound for a period of 12 months in order to pay back the majority if not the whole sum of the country's national debt, which i believe is costing the tax payer more in the long run, and to invest in new energy supplies such as nuclear, wind farms ect. that will reduce the cost of energy on an already struggling nation.
